name: AutoCAD Plotter Configuration File
summary: Learn about .PC3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PC3 files commonly have corresponding .PMP files, which provide additional plotter calibration information. To create a PC3 file in AutoCAD, select File → Plotter Manager → Add-a-Plotter Wizard.
NOTE: PC3 files apply to the AutoCAD 2000 and later.

description: File created by AutoCAD, a CAD program used to create 2D and 3D designs; contains plotter properties, such as color depth, media type, and print quality; used to configure specific plotter settings and save them for later use.
